code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./Home.css";import"react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css";import{Carousel}from'react-responsive-carousel';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import MovieList from"../../components/movieList/MovieList";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[popularMovies,setPopularMovies]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=4e44d9029b1270a757cddc766a1bcb63&language=en-US").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setPopularMovies(data.results));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"poster",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{showThumbs:false,autoPlay:true,transitionTime:3,infiniteLoop:true,showStatus:false,children:popularMovies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"white"},to:"/movie/".concat(movie.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posterImage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original".concat(movie&&movie.backdrop_path)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"posterImage__overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posterImage__title",children:movie?movie.original_title:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"posterImage__runtime",children:[movie?movie.release_date:"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"posterImage__rating",children:[movie?movie.vote_average:"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-star"})," "]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posterImage__description",children:movie?movie.overview:""})]})]}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieList,{})]})});};export default Home;
